item.description:
Applying the principles in both "The Secret" and "Excuse Me, Your Life is Waiting" into my everyday life has been nothing short of transformational! I'm looking forward to meeting others who do the same and hearing how they've transformed as a result!

Discussions have been inspiring at both the evening and daytime Meetups! Looking forward to continuing to exchange great ideas and have amazing discussions!

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Evening Meetup
